20110102015750.000|20110102015754.000|CC1|RECONNECTING TO THE IDEA OF     
20110102015754.000|20110102015755.000|CC1|SERVICE TO THE COUNTRY AND THEIR
20110102015755.000|20110102015756.000|CC1|COMMUNITIES.                    
20110102015756.000|20110102015757.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEY LAUNCHED A    
20110102015757.000|20110102015759.000|CC1|COMMUNITY BANK CALLED ONE       
20110102015759.000|20110102015800.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA THREE YEARS AGO TO   
20110102015800.000|20110102015803.000|CC1|PROVIDE ALON LOAN FOR AFFORDABLE

20110102015806.000|20110102015807.000|CC1|LOW-INCOME NEIGHBORHOODS.

20110102015815.000|20110102015816.000|CC1|STRONGLY ABOUT I ENVIRONMENT,

20110102015832.000|20110102015834.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ALL OF THE
